 SO_KIT_HEADER (TShapeKit)

Detailed Description

TShapeKit class groups what is necessary to the shape.

TShapeKit groups the shape geometry, material and the transformation.

Ray * TShapeKit::Intersect ( const Ray &  objectRay,
bool *  isShapeFront,
RandomDeviate &  rand 
) const

Interect object ray with the shape and computed reflected ray. The object ray is on shape local coordinates.

Return the reflected ray. If the returned value is null, there is not reflected ray.
